description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. - - - -UPDATE 2: HYPER COMBAT 3D - - - Unlockable speed settings - - - New run, punch, parry and swipe moves - - - Side by side Stereoscopic 3D  - - - Help Special Forces operative Della retrieve the Bio-waste containers that are causing the zombie outbreak. Grenade punch, shotgun, snipe, flame and jetpack your way through the zombies and evacuate to the helicopter.
description.short: - - - -UPDATE 2: HYPER COMBAT 3D - - - Unlockable speed settings - - - New run, punch, parry and swipe moves - - - Side by side Stereoscopic 3D  - - - Help Special Forces operative Della retrieve the Bio-waste containers that are causing the zombie outbreak. Grenade punch, shotgun, snipe, flame and jetpack your way through the zombies and evacuate to the helicopter.
